pkgmetadata.longdescription: Software for Summarising and Evaluating STRUCTURE Output // Statistical summary of STRUCTURE output. STRUCTURE is a K-means clustering method for inferring population structure and assigning individuals to populations using genetic data. Pritchard JK, Stephens M, Donnelly PJ (2000) DOI:10.1093/genetics/155.2.945. https://web.stanford.edu/group/pritchardlab/structure.html.
